channel.title: *is it possible to have a f2p\p2p source all in one?*
channel.description:
does anyone know if it is possible to make like F2P match with p2p?
what i mean is, i'm working on a source thats like runescape but it's all f2p..
would it be POSSIBLE, that if someone in my characters folder has the certian rights be able to logg onto my p2p source..
like, putting two sources into one..so i can run 2 at once..
so people can not only play on f2p but also on p2p..
if you know how to do this..just PM me or PLEASE [RECCOMENDED] add my MSN:
Drew1sgod@hotmail.com

item.title: *is it possible to have a f2p\p2p source all in one?*
item.dc:creator: @pesterd pesterd
item.source: *is it possible to have a f2p\p2p source all in one?*

item.title: *is it possible to have a f2p\p2p source all in one?*
item.dc:creator: @lewis2 lewis`
item.description:
@lewis2 wrote:

Well obviously its possable because runescape does it ,

You whould probally have to set it up so playerrights like say… 8 only can log into 1 source (world1) and f2p players with playerrights 0 can log into world 2 you whould have to port forward 2 ports , 5555 and the normal one so you could host 2 sources at the same time and obviously have a web client.

Read full topic
item.source: *is it possible to have a f2p\p2p source all in one?*

item.title: *is it possible to have a f2p\p2p source all in one?*
item.dc:creator: @mod_cody mod cody
item.description:
@mod_cody wrote:

LOL dude just add a member or donator for your server. make all the items u want f2p be donator items or member items

Read full topic

item.description:
@_J_ava wrote:

Its basicly the same as adding Donation. Just change it to members. :o,
